Object.Name: Notecard
Object.Description:
[b]v4.0.0-Beta[/b]: Vital Assets "bag" was removed.

All condition, objective, mine tokens are streamlined and use the same implementation.

Deployments use new projection-based deployment zone markers: try it out!

Dice rollers now announce results to the screen, and use a [i]simulated[/i] roll when using "roll".
